name: The Misadventure of Eric Reece
description:
By team AK JS.

A small adventure game in which you Eric Reece must navigate a mine to escae after a tunnel collapse, on the way you must battle strange creatures along with a interesting companion. Made for the UOP Game Jam 2022.

Controls 

WASD - Movement

Space - Jump

Left Click - Shot

Escape - Exit to main menu
